text: [Music]
once upon a time in a small village of a
small town lived a woman and her two
daughters
their names were snow-white and rose-red
snow-white was shy and kind person and
rose-red was energetic and playful
always looking to get up to her next
round of mischief Kathy was not so fast
[Music]
snow-white and rose-red would help their
mother every day with the chores at the
end of the day their mother would tell
them fairy tales they had a normal
routine life until the start of winter
where things begin to become interesting
one night mrs. white was reading a story
to her daughters they heard a knock on
the door all three of them were startled
they looked at the door nervously
worried about who is on the other side
of it don't worry my dears it must only
be some traveler who needs directions
I'll go check no mother I'll do it
oh my god what is it please stop
screaming I am just a bear quiet you
please my ears are hurting I only need
some help I am cold and hungry
all of them stop screaming as the bear
spoke he wasn't like other bears his
voice was gentle what sorry please come
in the three of them looked at him and
let him in you are covered in snow let
me help you out oh don't please stop Oh
Oh No
that is just terrible you - no no no no
all right that's enough you two let him
drink something boom get him a blanket
rose that night a friendship was formed
one that lasted all winter every day the
bear would come to their home bringing
gifts they would share the warmth of the
fireplace reading stories to him both
loving his company
then as time passed winter had come to
an end it was time for him to leave if
it weren't for the spell I would have
not met you - what do you mean what
spell you don't have to go you can stay
with us I have to go thank you for
everything you have done but now that
winter has ended I must go and he then
he left leaving behind his friends whom
he loves so much a few days later
snow-white and rose-red
walked through the forest picking up
fruits and wood all of a sudden they
heard a strange bunch of screams come
from ahead of them they followed the
sounds and saw something strange a dwarf
had his long beard stuck under a fallen
tree as he jumped up and down screaming
in frustration damn tree stop staring
you - get over here quickly and help me
out they dropped their things together
they tried lifting the tree pulling and
lifting as much as they could with all
their might they tried both of them then
gave up suddenly rose-red
had an idea the dwarf continued to jump
up and down until he saw what was in
rose red's hands no wait hey what do you
think you're going to do the girls were
amused by the dwarfs behavior they had
helped him and yet he was angry with him
he continued yelling at them as he
walked away into the forest without even
thanking them for their help the next
day the girls decided to stroll near the
river once again they heard the yelping
and tiny little screams of the dwarf
they met the sisters once again ran to
help him out this time his beard was
stuck in the mouth of a large fish you
got yourself into don't you see that
dreadful fish wants to pull me into the
water at me snow-white and rose-red
decided to help him again all the going
to drown in the water I can't hold it
anymore
I'm going to cut your beard why why are
you after my beard how would I show my
face to my friends stupid little girls
both sisters were amused and started to
laugh but then they heard
on a large rock behind them a young man
lay flat on the ground with a bruise on
his forehead hey what are you doing here
I am Prince Adam I'm looking for my
brother Joseph he has been missing since
the winter oh I am Snow White and this
is my sister rose red can we help you
find him he had gone for a stroll
through the forest with a bag of jewels
but along the way he disappeared I just
saw some creature that was carrying a
similar bag of jewels when I tried to
chase him he put a spell on me
couldn't see where I was going I fell
and hit my head on this rock I'm sorry
to hear that
he can help you as the girls promised to
help the Prince he felt comforted but in
that moment all three of them heard a
loud roaring sound from deep within the
woods behind them all three of them got
on to the horse and galloped in the
direction of the screaming they say the
dwarf won out of a cave as he was being
chased by the bear
[Music]
Oh friends why is he running off to the
to the Prince took out his sword and
started walking towards the bear and the
dwarf you girls wait here this is the
creature I saw with my brother's bag of
jewels he must pay for what he has done
be careful leave me alone take it take
all the treasure you won look what your
spell has turned me into I don't just
want to be the jewel leave this to me my
friend the dwarf is mine enough of this
foolishness now it is time to show my
true form
you think you can defeat me you will all
pay the price now oh my word quickly
rose my souls throw me my sword
it is his beard cut his beard it is
where all of his power is do it now as
the dwarf had taken his monstrous form
Snow White runs to him with her scissors
and red rose runs towards the sword you
think I will spare you Prince Adam threw
his sword with precision and it cut the
dwarf beard completely severing it from
its face the beard fell to the ground
and he began to shrink in size
suddenly the bear transformed into a
handsome prince Prince Joseph the
brother of Prince Adam Prince Adam
looked at his brother and then ran to
him to give him the longest hug ah I
have missed you brother it has been too
long
missed you too brother the evil dwarf
stole my jewels and put a spell on me
and I can't thank snow and red enough
for everything they did for me
Prince Joseph spoke of the kindness the
sister showed him so did Prince Adam
they both had fallen in love with the
sisters and the sisters in turn had
fallen in love with the princes in a
wedding that was the largest in the
kingdom Snow White married Prince Adam
and red rose married Prince Joseph now
Snow White and red rose who were first
scared by the bear then they looked
beyond the Bears appearance it shows us
that the true nature of someone lies
within their heart and both kindness and
love can break open any spell that the
world might cast upon you
